name: Dissociative Amnesia with Fugue State
chief_complaint: I don't remember who I am or how I got here
prognosis: Variable; most recover memories but some permanent gaps may remain. High risk of recurrence with stress.
description: A rare dissociative disorder characterized by sudden, unexpected travel away from home with inability to recall one's past and confusion about personal identity. Typically follows severe psychological stress or trauma. Memory loss is more extensive than normal forgetfulness and not due to substance use or medical condition.
